title: Internal Detox
description: Internal Detox supplements are formulated to detoxify and cleanse the blood. Available in 75 capsules from Health Hispanica.
cleaned_text: Description Internal Detox is a dietary supplement formulated to promote blood detox. [Internal Detox is available in capsules from Natura-Genics®](https://naturagenics.com/English/main-products/internal-detox.html). Key Ingredients Internal Detox is a combination of chlorophyll from mulberry leaves and thirteen ingredients to promote blood detoxification. Ingredients include activated charcoal, dandelion, and burdock root, known to support blood purifying effects. Benefits of Internal Detox Blood detoxes may promote the removal of toxins from the blood and support liver health. Chlorophyll promotes detoxifying effects through its purifying properties by turning toxic substances in the body harmless. Activated charcoal is also well known to support detoxifying effects. [It can bind to certain substances preventing the body from absorbing them](https://www.medicalnewstoday.com/articles/327074#does-it-work). Researchers have found that burdock root [contains active ingredients in its root system that can assist in the removal of toxins from the bloodstream](https://www.healthline.com/health/burdock-root#benefits). Additional ingredients such as milk thistle and dandelion support liver health to naturally filter toxins. The statements above have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA). This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease. Additional Information Recommendations As a dietary supplement, take one (1) capsule daily on an empty stomach. Daily consumption of eight (8) glasses of water, as well as a blend of lemon, carrot, and beet juice, is recommended. Storage Keep tightly closed in a dry place and do not expose to excessive heat. Caution Do not use this product if pregnant or nursing. Do not use this supplement if the band around the cap is broken or missing. If symptoms persist, consult a doctor. Keep this product out of reach of children. California Prop65 - For California Residents Only WARNING: Consuming this product can expose you to chemicals including lead, which is known to the State of California to cause cancer and birth defects or other reproductive harm. For more information go to www.P65Warnings.ca.gov/food Supplement Ingredients Chlorophyll (Sodium Copper Chlorophyllin), Gelatin.
